gen:link.msg:message: {fmt:common(($a, $b, $c, $d, $e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n, $o))} {fmt:fact($a, ($a, $b, $c, $d, $e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n, $o))} = {fmt:fact($b, ($a, $b, $c, $d, $e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n, $o))} + {fmt:fact($c, ($a, $b, $c, $d, $e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n, $o))} + {fmt:fact($d, ($a, $b, $c, $d, $e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n, $o))} + {fmt:fact($e, ($a, $b, $c, $d, $e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n, $o))} - min(({fmt:fact($f, ($a, $b, $c, $d, $e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n, $o))} + {fmt:fact($g, ($a, $b, $c, $d, $e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n, $o))} + {fmt:fact($h, ($a, $b, $c, $d, $e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n, $o))} + {fmt:fact($i, ($a, $b, $c, $d, $e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n, $o))}, 100.0 div 30.0 * {fmt:fact($j, ($a, $b, $c, $d, $e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n, $o))}, 100.0 div 60.0 * ({fmt:fact($k, ($a, $b, $c, $d, $e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n, $o))} + {fmt:fact($l, ($a, $b, $c, $d, $e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n, $o))}), 100.0 div 85.0 * ({fmt:fact($m, ($a, $b, $c, $d, $e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n, $o))} + {fmt:fact($n, ($a, $b, $c, $d, $e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n, $o))} + {fmt:fact($o, ($a, $b, $c, $d, $e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n, $o))}))) {fmt:threshold(iaf:error-margin($a) + iaf:error-margin(iaf:sum(($b, $c, $d, $e, iaf:numeric-unary-minus(iaf:min((iaf:sum(($f, $g, $h, $i)), iaf:numeric-multiply(iaf:numeric-divide(100.0, 30.0), $j), iaf:numeric-multiply(iaf:numeric-divide(100.0, 60.0), (iaf:sum(($k, $l)))), iaf:numeric-multiply(iaf:numeric-divide(100.0, 85.0), (iaf:sum(($m, $n, $o)))))))))))} {fmt:difference(abs(($a) - ($b + $c + $d + $e - min(($f + $g + $h + $i, 100.0 div 30.0 * $j, 100.0 div 60.0 * ($k + $l), 100.0 div 85.0 * ($m + $n + $o))))))}
